spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall alignment. Most doors and windows are correctly placed. Minor deduction for the entry door swing direction and the misalignment of the bathroom/closet door cluster.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms accounted for with no hallucinations. Roof is correctly removed, following all background and UI constraints. No text or measurement lines present.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent block-style furniture mapping. Kitchen counter, dining set, and bathroom fixtures match the plan well. Minor deduction for adding a small desk in Bedroom 2 not explicitly detailed in the original layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded style. The camera is correctly set to an isometric orthographic view. Lighting is clean and non-dramatic.

detected_errors.description: Front entry door and several interior door swings are oriented incorrectly compared to the floor plan.
Minor furniture hallucination: addition of a secondary desk/unit in Bedroom 2.
